response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. This product, valued at $10,000 by you, holds an even greater significance to us as it represents our commitment to excellence and innovation. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. We believe this is a fantastic opportunity for you to experience the value and quality of our product at a highly competitive rate. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further information. We look forward to serving you.", "product_price": 9500}
